ygData.subject: Re: Re: PGT as a via[ble?] 1hslash for a lvl 35 Bard?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a staff of writhing and even though I didn t pay for it (gift from guild), I usually see it go for around 500pp+ or trade. Although the staff is a good
ygData.messageBody:
I have a staff of writhing and even though I didn't pay for it (gift from
guild), I usually see it go for around 500pp+ or trade. Although the staff
is a good weapon, the -9 Cha is not good for Bards (as we use cha for
songs).
Unfortunately this is as close to a ykesha as I can get for 20 ish levels.

Madagan, bard of 27 songs (who can't wait for level 28 when his staff will
proc)






I have a PGT now, along with a dirk. I'm level 25, and I've had it for ...
umm... 6? levels.. (can't remember exactly when I got it). While its true
at higher levels the PGT becomes more of a hindrance than a help, at this
point for me, its still a help. I'll be upgrading it at some point, but
its
not a priority for me right now. Lambent armor is :)

Can anyone tell me what the worth of a Staff of Writhing on Povar is? I'd
love to upgrade to that, if I get the chance.

-Treehugger and Songmaker

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
